Class DefaultLogAxisEditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class DefaultLogAxisEditor
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    A panel for editing properties of a LogAxis.
    See Also:
